description: This file defines React components for a custom menubar UI, wrapping Radix UI primitive components with additional styling and structure. It exports various menu-related components like Menubar, MenubarTrigger, MenuItem, SubMenu, etc.

methods.name: MenubarMenu
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix Menubar primitive Menu component.

methods.name: MenubarGroup
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix Menubar primitive Group component.

methods.name: MenubarPortal
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix Menubar primitive Portal component.

methods.name: MenubarRadioGroup
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix Menubar primitive RadioGroup component.

methods.name: MenubarSub
methods.description: A wrapper component for Radix Menubar primitive Sub component.

methods.name: Menubar
methods.description: Main Menubar component with styling and forwarding ref.

methods.name: MenubarContent
methods.description: Main content container for the Menubar.

methods.name: MenubarShortcut
methods.description: Display shortcut hints in menu items.
